verses.text: \w For|strong="H7442"\w* David, \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* changed \w his|strong="H3068"\w* countenance before Achimelech, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* dismissed \w him|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* went \w his|strong="H3068"\w* way. [1 Kings 21]

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bless \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* all times, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* always \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* mouth.
\w In|strong="H3190"\w* \w the|strong="H3190"\w* Lord shall \w my|strong="H3190"\w* soul be \w praised|strong="H7891"\w*: let \w the|strong="H3190"\w* meek hear \w and|strong="H7891"\w* rejoice.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* magnify \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w us|strong="H3588"\w* extol \w his|strong="H3605"\w* name together.

\w I|strong="H0776"\w* sought \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* heard \w me|strong="H4941"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* delivered \w me|strong="H4941"\w* \w from|strong="H0776"\w* all \w my|strong="H3068"\w* troubles.

\w Come|strong="H6635"\w* ye \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* enlightened: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* faces \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* not \w be|strong="H1697"\w* confounded.

This poor man \w cried|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Lord heard \w him|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H4325"\w* saved \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* all \w his|strong="H5414"\w* troubles.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* angel \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* encamp round \w about|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w them|strong="H3427"\w*.

O taste, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* see \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H1931"\w* sweet: blessed \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* man \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hopeth \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w him|strong="H6680"\w*.

Fear \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, all ye \w his|strong="H3068"\w* saints: \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* no want \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w him|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* rich \w have|strong="H3068"\w* wanted, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* suffered hunger: \w but|strong="H3820"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* not \w be|strong="H3820"\w* deprived \w of|strong="H3068"\w* any good.

Come, children, hearken \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H0977"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* teach \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* fear \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* desireth life: \w who|strong="H3605"\w* loveth \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* good days?
Keep thy tongue \w from|strong="H0413"\w* evil, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thy lips \w from|strong="H0413"\w* speaking guile.

\w Turn|strong="H0995"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* evil \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w do|strong="H4639"\w* good: seek \w after|strong="H0413"\w* peace \w and|strong="H3820"\w* pursue \w it|strong="H3335"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3808"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* Lord \w are|strong="H0369"\w* upon \w the|strong="H3808"\w* just: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5337"\w* ears unto \w their|strong="H5337"\w* prayers.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* countenance \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H3808"\w* against them \w that|strong="H3808"\w* do evil \w things|strong="H3808"\w*: \w to|strong="H4422"\w* cut off \w the|strong="H3808"\w* remembrance \w of|strong="H7230"\w* them \w from|strong="H4422"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H0413"\w* just cried, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* heard \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* delivered \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H2009"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* troubles.

\w The|strong="H5337"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H5315"\w* nigh unto \w them|strong="H5337"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* a contrite \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*: \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H4194"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w save|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H5337"\w* humble \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w spirit|strong="H5315"\w*.

Many \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* afflictions \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* just; \w but|strong="H1931"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1931"\w* all \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w them|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* Lord keepeth all \w their|strong="H3588"\w* bones, \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w them|strong="H8055"\w* \w shall|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* broken.

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* death \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* wicked \w is|strong="H0834"\w* very evil: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hate \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w just|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* guilty.
The Lord will redeem the souls of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall offend.
